Program to improve Productivity and Competitiveness
Programa de Mejoramiento de la Productividad y Competitividad

description.narrative: Apoyar la agenda del Gobierno del Perú en el fortalecimiento de la competitividad de la economía, en aspectos relacionados con la gestión del plan de infraestructura, innovación y desarrollo productivo.

Support the agenda of the Government of Peru in strengthening the competitiveness of the economy, in aspects related to the management of the infrastructure plan, innovation and productive development.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2019
Disbursement in third quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2022
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2021
